item.title: Do You Know the Surprising Way to Spell 'Indian'? Find Out Now!
item.description: Do You Know the Surprising Way to Spell ‘Indian’? Find Out Now! Have you ever wondered why the word “Indian” is spelled the way it is? It turns out that the spelling of this word has changed a lot over time, and the way it is spelled today is actually quite surprising! In this blog post, we’ll take a look at the history of the word “Indian” and why the surprising way to spell it is important.
